item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "<b>Résumé</b> Razors pain you, Rivers are damp, Acids stain you, And drugs cause cramp. Guns aren't lawful, Nooses give, Gas smells awful. You might as well live." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Wisdom Quote
item.description: "A wise old Owl sat on an oak, The more he saw the less he spoke, The less he spoke the more he heard, Why aren't we like that wise old bird?" -- Wisdom Quote

item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Draw a crazy picture, Write a nutty poem, Sing a mumble-gumble song, Whistle through your comb. Do a loony-goony dance 'Cross the kitchen floor, Put something silly in the world That ain't been there before." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Dumpster Baby add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "i made myself a snowball As perfect as can be. I thought I'd keep it as a pet, And let it sleep with me. I made it some pajamas And a pillow for it's head. Then last night it ran away, But first - It wet the bed." -- Shel Silverstein
